alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:32PM CDT until May 27 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Fish River Near Silverhill affecting Baldwin County. For the Fish River...including Silverhill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Fish River Near Silverhill. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage, County Road 48 floods at Bohemian Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue rising to a crest of 11.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage by Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
